description: Number of rooted maps with n edges on Klein bottle.
references: Didier Arques and Jean-Francois Beraud, RAIRO, vol. 31, no. 4, 1997, pp. 385-409.
David M. Jackson  and Terry I. Visentin, An Atlas of the Smaller Maps in Orientable and Nonorientable Surfaces, Chapman & Hall/CRC, circa 2000. See page 227.
author: Jean-Francois Beraud (beraud(AT)univ-mlv.fr)
